data.message: Facebook, I understand some people aren't smart enough to know what they are most interested in, so you need to help them out, but I guarantee you that I know better what I am most interested in than you. When you made this claim in taking over my newsfeed, I started using notifications to make sure I saw everything that I am interested in. Now you have taken over my notifications feed. Can I please keep my notifications in TIME order and not reordered based on what you think I want to see first?

replies.message: Hi Michelle. We've invested a lot to understand how News Feed can show the most engaging content to the majority of people. Top Stories is the result of our findings, which is why it is the default. We know that some people prefer the Most Recent view, so we've kept this option available. If you have specific thoughts you want to share, please let us know here: http://bit.ly/2z07CvX. -Tenaya
I know this, but I want this option for my notifications list. Thanks!
